name: Dragonforcements (Boss Ability Card)
text:
Legendary Lord of Dragons / Boss Ability 
Flip this card over and activate it as a Normal Spell in your Spell/Trap Zone when you activate this ability. 
Pay 1000 LP; You can Normal Summon 1 Dragon monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. 
This Boss Ability can only be done once per turn. 
If this card would return to your hand or Deck, return it to your Extra Zone instead. 
During your End Phase: Return this card from anywhere to your Extra Zone. (even if this card is face-down.) 

Concept by MauGamesLOL
